references.paper_title: The rise and potential of large language model based agents: A survey
references.reason: This paper serves as a foundational survey specifically on the topic of LLM agents, defining their core aspects and potential.

references.paper_title: Towards reasoning in large language models: A survey
references.reason: This paper provides a survey in the field of LLM, specifically towards reasoning in LLMs, providing some background for the current paper.

references.paper_title: React: Synergizing reasoning and acting in language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the ReAct framework, a key concept in enabling LLMs to interact with environments by combining reasoning and action.

references.paper_title: Large language models are zero-shot reasoners
references.reason: This paper was one of the first to identify how LLMs could provide reasoning when prompted correctly.

references.paper_title: On the Opportunities and Risks of Foundation Models
references.reason: This paper provides a broad overview of foundation models, which serve as the core component of LLM agents, discussing opportunities and risks.
